image.copyright: Detail of spines on the exterior of a sea star (Evasterias retifera) near Primorsky Krai, Russia (Â© SuperStock)

hotspot.desc: Those pale-blue dots are called spines, and all sea stars have them.
hotspot.query: They come in a variety of shapes and colors

hotspot.desc: Recently, sea stars on the North American Pacific coast have been wasting away.
If sea stars ever need to work on their brand...
hotspot.query: They have at least one celebrity spokesman to lean on

hotspot.desc: Despite their innocuous appearance, many sea stars are aggressive, if slow, predators.
hotspot.query: The sunflower sea star is ruthless when hunting
